name: Base of the cliff
description: You're in the north wall of a big mountain. You can see three paths, one on each direction. In the wall behind you there's a painting.

name: Cave
description: You're inside a small and cold cave. It's a dead end.

name: Forest
description: This is a dense forest. There's a high tree with some branches you can reach.

name: Up the tree
description: After climbing over 5 meters you've reached the top of the tree. From here you can see your camp at the far north.

name: Clearing
description: You're in a clearing with a forest surrounding you in all directions but east.

name: Well entrance
description: You're in a clearing with a natural well big enough for a person to go through.

name: Inside the well
description: It's dark and cold in here. A dead and decayed animal rests on the floor. It probably died from the fall.

name: Narrow path
description: It's a very tight path between two mountain walls. You can see ahead some creature's lair, it looks dangerous!

name: Smilodon's lair
description: You face Smilodon: The Saber-toothed cat.
